question: What significant cultural title does the Old Town of Toruń, Poland hold since 1997?
true_answer: It is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
asked_question_translated: Welchen bedeutenden kulturellen Titel trägt die Altstadt von Toruń, Polen, seit 1997?
answer: Die Altstadt von Toruń, Polen, trägt seit 1997 den Titel eines UNESCO-Weltkulturerbes.
answer_translated_eng: The old town centre of Toruń, Poland, has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1997.
